function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Drive around neighborhoods like the ice cream truck","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases if proper safety measures are not followed","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, use protective gear, and enforce social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Mobile ordering apps, contactless payment systems","People":"Community members in the neighborhoods, truck staff and volunteers","Owner":"Truck staff and volunteers, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Long lines of people waiting for food","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and crowding, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, enforce social distancing, and use pre-ordering systems to reduce wait times","Technologies":"Mobile ordering apps, crowd management software, contactless payment systems","People":"Community members waiting in line, truck staff and volunteers","Owner":"Truck staff and volunteers, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of hashtags to be part of a larger conversation about the community","Impact":"Potential for misinformation and disinformation about COVID-19 to spread through social media","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information and resources about COVID-19, monitor and moderate social media channels for misinformation","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking resources, community engagement platforms","People":"Community members following the hashtags, social media users","Owner":"Truck staff and volunteers, local health authorities"}]}
